mapper.select: SELECT chat_no, prdt_id, chat_writer, chat_context, chat_date, user_no FROM tb_chat_service where prdt_id = #{prdt_id} order by chat_date
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_chat_service WHERE chat_no = #{chat_no} and chat_writer = 'ezen'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_chat_service (prdt_id, chat_writer, chat_context, user_no) VALUES (#{prdt_id}, 'ezen', #{chat_context});
